rows.text_1_facilitator: Sometimes we experience a lot of emotions and feelings, especially when caring for others. How should we manage them?

text_1_facilitator.eng: Sometimes we experience a lot of emotions and feelings, especially when caring for others. How should we manage them?

rows.text_1_facilitator: @data.characters.f3_mother.name is a single mother of young children. She often feels that between work, parenting, and managing the home, she does not have enough time for her children. She wants to spend more time with @data.characters.f3_son_7.name, her middle child.

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f3_mother.name is a single mother of young children. She often feels that between work, parenting, and managing the home, she does not have enough time for her children. She wants to spend more time with @data.characters.f3_son_7.name, her middle child.

character_1_text.eng: What is it, @data.characters.f3_son_7.name? Are you okay?

character_2_text.eng: All my friends in class had a parent attend our school performance today and you were not there! I hate that you have to work all the time. It is not fair!"

rows.character_1_text: What is it, @data.characters.f3_son_7.name? Are you okay?
rows.character_2_text: All my friends in class had a parent attend our school performance today and you were not there! I hate that you have to work all the time. It is not fair!"

rows.character_1_text:
(Thinking...)

- Iâ€™m trying my best.
- Trying to make ends meet and raise three children alone is very difficult.
- Other parents find this hard too. Iâ€™m not alone.
- This is not the last school performance. There will be other opportunities to show up for @data.characters.f3_son_7.name.
- Things have been very difficult lately, and I need to take some time out to look after myself.

character_1_text.eng:
(Thinking...)

- Iâ€™m trying my best.
- Trying to make ends meet and raise three children alone is very difficult.
- Other parents find this hard too. Iâ€™m not alone.
- This is not the last school performance. There will be other opportunities to show up for @data.characters.f3_son_7.name.
- Things have been very difficult lately, and I need to take some time out to look after myself.

rows.character_1_text: My @data.characters.f3_son_7.name, you practised so hard for this performance. I am sorry I could not get out of work. Can you give me my own performance after dinner? I want to see how brilliant you are!

character_1_text.eng: My @data.characters.f3_son_7.name, you practised so hard for this performance. I am sorry I could not get out of work. Can you give me my own performance after dinner? I want to see how brilliant you are!

character_2_text.eng: I will try, Mama, but I still wish you were there.

rows.character_2_text: I will try, Mama, but I still wish you were there.

section_1_text.eng:
ğŸ˜£ Sometimes, it seems easier to ignore negative feelings.
â—But ignoring them only means they will come up later or get worse!
ğŸš© When you feel any negative emotion, notice what you are feeling. 
â­ It can be helpful to name this feeling for yourself.

section_2_text.eng:
ğŸ›‘ Take a pause or a few deep breaths.
ğŸ’› Say to yourself, â€œItâ€™s OK,â€ because it is OK to have negative feelings. Everyone does sometimes!
ğŸ˜” These feelings come up for a good reason and can tell us something. It really is OK!

section_3_text.eng:
ğŸ’š When you notice these feelings, itâ€™s important to be kind and patient with yourself.
ğŸ Think about what kind of advice your friend or family member might give you now.
